channel.title: RuneScape Full Screen For F2P
channel.description:
Hey guys I was just wondering how do you get like a full screen for F2P? Like the member one but not literally the whole entire screen? Because my sister was doing it and I was like WTF how did you do that lol and since she has like problems she's like IDK...
NOTE: This picture if from another post and I want a full screen like it?
http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j270/n2lil/newc.png

item.title: RuneScape Full Screen For F2P
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Just use the web dev toolbar to edit the CSS, remove the height rule for the advertisement and the toolbar, then hide the address toolbar etc and press F11.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Full Screen For F2P
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

The client will only go into fullscreen depending on the parameters loaded in the beginning of the game. Unless Jagex made a mistake (which I highly doubt), I don’t think it’s possible to go into fullscreen while F2P.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Full Screen For F2P
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

I heard one where you enter something in the URL that makes it full.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Full Screen For F2P
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Thats not fullscreen, just a resized client which is a new feature jagex added.

Or though is there actually any hacks out atm to have the official fullscreen while being f2p?

Read full topic
